CustomField.description:
Mapped via Chili Piper.
Notes: This field is only relevant when using Concierge "Inbound Router". The value "Booked" will be written when the meeting is booked / event created in Salesforce. The value "Not Booked" will be written based on the timeout (7 min, 10 min, etc.) defined in Queues for prospects who didn't take action within your Router settings.
*You must have at least one queue in the "Queues for prospects who didn't take action" section of your router for the "Not Booked" value to write to Salesforce, even if you don't want distribution. If you have another system using this field to route and do not want to have Chili Piper distribute those leads who do not book, you can add a "fake" queue into this section, with rules that will never match. i.e. RelatedLead.Email = 123.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is only relevant when using Concierge "Inbound Router". The value "Booked" will be written when the meeting is booked / event created in Salesforce. The value "Not Booked" will be written based on the timeout (7 min, 10 min, etc.) defined in Queues for prospects who didn't take action within your Router settings.
CustomField.label: Booking Status
